alert.note: Alert for Coastal Franklin; Inland Franklin; Inland Wakulla; Leon; Liberty (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued November 27 at 4:10AM EST by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of western Wakulla, southeastern Liberty, southwestern Leon and central Franklin Counties through 500 AM EST... At 409 AM EST, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 16 miles south of Greensboro to 10 miles south of St George Island. Movement was northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Carrabelle, Eastpoint, St George Island, Franklin, Carrabelle Beach, East Camp, Jewel Fire Tower, Brown House, Royal Bluff, St George Island St Pk, Clio, Poplar Camp, Smith Creek, Bloxham, Twin Pole, Telogia, Morgan Place, High Bluff, Yent Place and Sanborn. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Franklin; Inland Franklin; Inland Wakulla; Leon; Liberty
